"Unit Skill Addition":
"A ★12+ unit (armor) can have a Unit Skill added to it.

You can have up to three Unit Skills equipped, one each in your
Arm, Leg and Rear slots.

※Only L Ring Skills can be added to a Unit."

"To add a Unit Skill, select \"Unit Skill Addition\" at the Item Lab, then select the ★12+ unit to use as a base and the material item you want to use.

※The following items can be used as material:
・An L Skill Ring
・A Unit with a Ring Skill added to it"

"The base and material items will both become untradeable, and the material item's Ring Skill will be added to the base item.

※If you have multiple copies of a Ring Skill equipped, you will only receive the benefits of the one with the highest level.

※The Unit Skill's level will be equal to the level of the Ring Skill at the time that you added it. You cannot raise the level of a Ring Skill after it has been added to a Unit."
